The People of the State of Illinois, Plaintiff-Appellee, v. Randall Lee Kirby, Defendant-Appellant.(No. 11371;Fourth DistrictJune 24, 1971.Morton Zwick, Director of Defender Project, of Chicago, for appellant.Basil G. Greanias, State’s Attorney, of Decatur, for the People.

Abstract of Decision

Opinion by Mr. JUSTICE CRAVEN.
